duties_responsibilities.duty: Build year-round client relationships and provide tax preparation, tax audit support, and tax planning.
Conduct tax interviews face to face and through virtual communication tools.
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Grow tax expertise and work in a fast-paced, supportive environment.
Complete 18-hour continuing education requirement and meet all other IRS and applicable state requirements.
Conduct business tax returns and virtual tax interviews (preferred).
Create confidence in clients and contribute to well-being programs including mental health support and coaching.
Embrace a Connected Culture and assist colleagues with growth and support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (CPA or Enrolled Agent certification preferred)
